review: $32!  We are a cable free household, and having chromecast makes streaming videos so much easier than our smart tv.  It is definitely worth the price.  The only thing I would add as a buyer beware with any of the casting-like devices is to make sure your wireless router can handle the bandwidth.  We had a couple year old Belkin router, and the increase bandwidth the chromecast needed led us to buying a new wireless router.  That said, it was not the fault of the Chromecast.  Also, if you need a great router to handle the load check out the ASUS RT-N12.  Super cheap and worked great for a house full of wireless devices

review: Chromecast is wonderful and keeps getting better. It seems to heat up a bit, so leave it space for venting, but its never been a problem for us. Its incredible how easy it is to stream on our tv. It keeps getting better, now that you can stream almost anything from your computer if you're using Chrome. They'll have to work on lag a bit for things like gaming, but its an amazing value for the cost.
